title: Riot Plz have more report Option about bad ping and lag  so i dont ever play with those player
body: Lately i had been play with far too many people that had bad internet. And i couldn't even report that cause they not feeding nor they AFK or leaving game so i got nothing to report them about so please Riot add  those option and ban those people and doesn't made my gaming experience or the other playing your game a bad one ...................................

replies.body:
Hey Boss Le,

If players are leaving matches, you can report them for Leaving the Game/AFK, although chances are that these players will be hit with LeaverBuster punishments.
